snippet: A federal lawsuit is challenging Washington State’s authority to tax marijuana as long as marijuana remains illegal under federal law.
abstract: Federal lawsuit is challenging Washington State’s authority to tax marijuana as long as marijuana remains illegal under federal law.
lead_paragraph: A federal lawsuit is challenging Washington State’s authority to tax marijuana as long as marijuana remains illegal under federal law.

headline.main: Washington: Lawsuit Challenges Authority to Tax Marijuana
headline.print_headline: Washington: Lawsuit Challenges Authority to Tax Marijuana
